credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 2 11/16 x 2 in. (6.9 x 5.1 cm)
Base: 1 in. (2.6 cm)
title: Amphoriskos ("little amphora")
description: Mold-blown bottle in light-violet glass. Egg-shaped body; part of the cylindrical neck and rim missing. Originally had two handles joining rim to shoulder. The vessel is decorated with flutes above and below a central band with crossed design. The base is round and flat. Overall bright purple and blue (some green) iridescence.
